metadata.title: CVE-2021-45102 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in HTCondor 9.0.x before 9.0.4 and 9.1.x before9.1.2. When authenticating to an HTCondor daemon using a SciToken, a usermay be granted authorizations beyond what the token should allow.

criterions.comment: condor package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
